attributes.action: Admit that UK, along with USA and other "Allied's" caused the migration problem
attributes.additional_details:
Oil prices are low, is this the reason why the Western governments have lost respect for these people, therefore trying to keep them out of Europe.

We submit, that as a western nation, we caused this upheaval & recommend that Tony Blair & George W Bush are handed over to the Hague to answer for their war crimes..
attributes.background: UK, USA, and other Allied forces, have caused the present mayhem currently happening on the shores of Europe.  Tony Blair & George W Bush acted on information which was untrue, but nonetheless acted in their own self-interests, because the price of oil was high.

rejection.details: We're sorry - it is not clear what specific action you want to happen.
